Racing & Athletics

A collection of races, personal records, and athletic milestones.

5K Personal Best

5:00

Set a new personal record in the 5K during the 2024 Niagara Road Series, improving pace and race consistency through structured interval and tempo training.

Niagara Falls Half Marathon

5:00

Completed the Niagara Falls Half Marathon with strong negative splits and improved endurance strategy while managing elevation and pacing challenges.

Track Sprint Event – 400m

5:00

Achieved a season-best time in the 400m, refining acceleration, stride mechanics, and late-race speed endurance through disciplined track sessions.
